content: Changes the Class.Plugin type, as well as many related Instance types, to be plugin-level security.
Fixes a crash that could occur at login in Studio.
Adds a visual editor for Class.AudioCompressor and Class.AudioLimiter instances.
Class.AssetService:CreateEditableMeshAsync() now supports creating an Class.EditableMesh from another Class.EditableMesh via Datatype.Content.fromObject()|Content.fromObject(editableMesh).
Fixes the generation of some unresolved types like 'a <: number.
MicroProfiler now shows the links between scopes that are part of the same job.
In Luau's New Type Solver, reading from an unknown variable will now produce an unknown symbol error in non-strict mode.
Fixes a crash for the new Luau type solver on some Datatype.Vector3 methods.
Fixes an issue with Enum.Material|Glass material rendering in Studio's "Unified Lighting" beta.
Fixes a bug in Studio's "New Luau type solver" beta preventing the types of unannotated variables in multiple assignments from being correctly inferred.
Fixes bug where importing malformed animation curve .rbxmx files resulted in Studio crashing.
Addressed a crash that could occur with TextChannel:SetDirectChatRequestor. This should no longer occur.
Adds new Enum.ProductPurchaseChannel field to the Class.MarketplaceService.ProcessReceipt callback to inform developers of the sale channel for the purchase.
Using %c with a 0 value in Luau Library.string.format() now appends \0 to the string instead of skipping the value.
Addresses an issue where the default Class.TextChatService chat window sometimes clips longer messages behind the scrollbar instead of wrapping around to the next line.
